name: MoltSim
trend: Moltbook — a viral social network exclusively for AI agents where humans can only observe — hit 1.5M agents and drew Skynet comparisons

name: NeoPet AI
trend: AI-powered companion toys going viral in China — Tamagotchi-like pets that evolve, chat, and simulate emotions

name: PromptWorm
trend: AI prompt worms — self-replicating instructions spreading through agent networks — become the #1 AI security concern after Moltbook exposes vulnerabilities

name: ToonifyMe
trend: ChatGPT AI caricature trend goes viral — users turn selfies into cartoon-style avatars using AI image generation prompts
